main event: A bright bluish object hovered over a field in Rossburg, Ohio, while witnesses observed it from their car for about 15 minutes.
interesting points: The object was described as brilliant blue and circular,The witnesses couldn't definitively identify parts of the object due to its hovering position,The object remained stationary and showed no visible heading or speed, It appeared to have three bright discs,The sighting was reported by a female witness aged 40.
